SELECT
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM countries WHERE active=1) AS pays,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM routes) AS routes,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM localities) AS localites,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM stages) AS etapes,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM establishments) AS etablissements,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM locality_content) AS contenus_localites,
  (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT locality_id) FROM locality_content) AS localites_enrichies,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM localities WHERE scrape_status='pending') AS loc_pending,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM localities WHERE scrape_status='done') AS loc_done,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM localities WHERE scrape_status='error') AS loc_error,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM establishments WHERE created_at > NOW() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR) AS new_estab_24h,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM locality_content WHERE created_at > NOW() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR) AS new_content_24h,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM scrape_jobs WHERE status='done' AND created_at > NOW() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR) AS jobs_ok_24h,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM scrape_jobs WHERE status='error' AND created_at > NOW() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR) AS jobs_err_24h,
  (SELECT category, COUNT(*) AS n FROM establishments GROUP BY category ORDER BY n DESC LIMIT 1) AS top_category
SELECT category, COUNT(*) AS nb FROM establishments GROUP BY category ORDER BY nb DESC LIMIT 10
